PHRASE.LANG: More fun than a barrel of monkeys is Chim Peep! Dressed to the nines in his monkey suit, he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Chim Peep est plus amusant qu'une bande de singes! Habillé à quatre épingles en costume , il te suivra partout et sera ton meilleur pote[#Legal]
Mehr Spaß als ein Affenhaus verspricht Chim Peep! Wie aus dem Ei gepellt in seinem Affenoutfit wird er dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist dein bester Freund. [#Legal]
Chim Peep é piú divertente di tante scimmie messe insieme! Vestito alla grande con il suo vestito di scimmia, ti seguirá dentro in Casa e diventerá il tuo migliore amico.[#Legal]
Chim Peep es más divertido que un barril lleno de monos! Vestido de fiesta en su traje de mono, te seguirá a tu Casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
원숭이보다 더 재미있는 원숭이 Chim Peep! 우아한 수트를 입히면 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어 합니다.[#Legal]
More fun than a barrel of monkeys is Chim Peep! Dressed to the nines in his monkey suit, he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Chim是非常有趣的Peep！他作出精心打扮，並會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Chim是非常有趣的Peep！他作出精心打扮，並會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
More fun than a barrel of monkeys is Chim Peep! Dressed to the nines in his monkey suit, he will follow you throughout Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
